page.title: 05BUILDING
page.content: There are some modern properties interspersed between older and established ones. Sometimes recent {development}has unfortunately not taken sufficient account of the form and traditional materials of existing dwellings.{Planning controls}have recently become stricter but this also causes some alarm as the{population}is growing older and it is thought that only new cheaper housing will encourage young families to continue to live in the village. There are {strong feelings}for and against more development. At present, 1985, there is a move to build houses on a central plot next to the school. Most houses have hot and cold running water, bathrooms and indoor toilets. A{sewerage system}for only the centre of the village was built in 1969, the year men landed on the moon.
